frontmatter.title: Video games in the service of CH institutions: the case of the ReInHerit Museum Management Game

node.excerpt: About this webinar: An exciting exploration of the fusion between modern technology and cultural heritage as we delve into the world of video games! In this webinar, we'll take you on a captivating journey through the innovative use of video games…
